kevin-cui.name: Kevin Cui
kevin-cui.title: Co-Founder & State Ambassador
kevin-cui.roleDescription: As a founder, I work with my partner to oversee and direct all aspects of the organization, namely chapter establishment, curriculum development, and outreach/growth initiatives.
kevin-cui.about: Hey, I'm Kevin Cui, a sophomore at Jasper High School in Texas and the co-founder of AI in STEM. I'm extremely passionate about technology, especially AI, machine learning, and robotics, while also being deeply committed to making education freely accessible to all, regardless of circumstances. Through AI in STEM, I'm able to bring these passions together by building chapters across the nation and developing a free, detailed yet student-friendly online curriculum to empower STEM-interested youth.
kevin-cui.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing.

aarav-rao.name: Aarav Rao
aarav-rao.title: Co-Founder & State Ambassador
aarav-rao.roleDescription: As a founder, I work with my partner to oversee and direct all aspects of the organization, namely chapter establishment, curriculum development, and outreach/growth initiatives.
aarav-rao.about: Hey everybody, My name's Aarav Rao. I'm currently a sophomore at Jasper High School in Texas and the other co-founder of AI in STEM. I‚Äôm really into technology, especially AI and machine learning, but I also care a lot about using tech in a way that‚Äôs good for the planet and making education something everyone can access. Through AI in STEM, I get to combine these interests by creating chapters across the country and building a free, easy-to-use online curriculum that helps students learn about STEM without feeling left behind.
aarav-rao.quote: Technology is best when it brings people together.

shanmukha-bommana.name: Shanmukha Bommana
shanmukha-bommana.title: Curriculum Developer
shanmukha-bommana.roleDescription: As a curriculum developer, I work on designing & creating student-friendly and detailed educational slideshows, articles and other resources used by chapters across the nation.
shanmukha-bommana.about: Hi, I'm Shanmukha Bommana, a senior at Aubrey High School in Texas. I'm passionate about AI and its development in the future, looking forward to working with AI and incorporating it more into our daily lives than thought possible. The opportunities and mission of AI in STEM led me to join, as for me, AI has always been a passion, and the thought that I could help others learn and use AI really got my attention and was an opportunity I couldn't pass up.
shanmukha-bommana.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

smyan-reddy.name: Smyan Reddy
smyan-reddy.title: State Ambassador & Chapter President
smyan-reddy.roleDescription: As a Chapter President and State Ambassador, I lead local initiatives and represent AI in STEM at the state level, working to expand STEM education and establish new chapters across Georgia.
smyan-reddy.about: I'm Smyan Reddy, an ambitious freshman at Lambert High School in Suwanee, Georgia. I'm passionate about the role of AI in the modern world and how it impacts one major part of life: STEM. The embodiment of the future rests in the palm of AI, and I want to accelerate the impact by educating individuals about how the future could be enunciated through the proper use and development of Artificial Intelligence. I'm an avid golf player, a budding coder and competitive programmer, and I actively pursue my passion for playing the violin.
smyan-reddy.quote: Do not put to tomorrow what can be done today.

tejus-peri.name: Tejus Peri
tejus-peri.title: State Ambassador, Chapter President & Outreach Manager
tejus-peri.roleDescription: As a Chapter President and State Ambassador, I lead local initiatives and represent AI in STEM at the state level, working to expand STEM education and establish new chapters across Georgia. Additionally, in the Georgia chapter, I also work on social media outreach and graphic design, along with being a curriculum developer and mentor!
tejus-peri.about: My name is Tejus Peri, and I am a freshman at Alliance Academy for Innovation. I am passionate about aerospace, research, and innovation, and I hope to one day contribute to groundbreaking advancements in aviation and space exploration. I joined AI in STEM because I wanted to explore how artificial intelligence can be applied to real-world challenges while collaborating with other motivated students. I also play the euphonium and enjoy competing in chess tournaments!
tejus-peri.quote: No retreat, no surrender; that is Spartan law.

samdeesh-thukral.name: Samdeesh Thukral
samdeesh-thukral.title: Outreach Manager & Curriculum Developer
samdeesh-thukral.roleDescription: As an Outreach Manager and Curriculum Developer, I work on expanding our reach through strategic partnerships and community engagement while also creating comprehensive educational resources and curriculum materials to support STEM education initiatives.
samdeesh-thukral.about: Hi! My name is Samdeesh Thukral and I am currently a freshman in Lambert High School. I have a passion for Cybersecurity, and it relates to AI in STEM because AI enhances Cybersecurity, while Cybersecurity protects AI.
samdeesh-thukral.quote: Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it

sai-vikhyath-belda.name: Sai Vikhyath Belda
sai-vikhyath-belda.title: Chapter President & Outreach Manager

sai-vikhyath-belda.about: My name is Sai Vikhyath Belda, but I go by Vicky. I go to Lambert High School, my current year is 9th. I'm passionate about being an entrepreneur when I grow up as well as learning how AI is really evolving and how it will benefit us for the better. I also like to advertise business, organization etc. This relates to the impact I want to make at AI In STEM by me being helpful as an outreach manager.
sai-vikhyath-belda.quote: If you had a goal, and actually believe you can do it, your halfway there.

aditya-pradhan.name: Aditya Pradhan
aditya-pradhan.title: Chapter President, State Ambassador & Outreach Manager
aditya-pradhan.roleDescription: As a Chapter President, State Ambassador, and Outreach Manager, I lead local initiatives and represent AI in STEM at the state level, working to expand STEM education and establish new chapters while also focusing on outreach and community engagement strategies.
aditya-pradhan.about: My name is Aditya Pradhan, and I'm a senior at Richard Montgomery High School. I'm passionate about using analytical thinking and technology to solve messy, real-world problems. As president of my school's Finance Club and an IB student researching defense economics, I've learned to combine quantitative models with careful ethical thinking. At AI in STEM I want to build interpretable AI tools that help non-specialists access data-driven answers for example, lightweight models that help small research teams analyze experimental results, or explainable systems that help policymakers understand trade-offs in resource allocation.
aditya-pradhan.quote: If you want a thing done well, do it yourself

ashvik-talluru.name: Ashvik Talluru
ashvik-talluru.title: Outreach Manager & Curriculum Developer

ashvik-talluru.about: My name is Ashvik Talluru, and I am a Freshman at Lambert High School. I really love learning about AI and how it affects day to day activities. This affects AI in STEM because I like researching about AI, and I already have prior knowledge about how AI affects certain parts in life. I also love watching football and learning about history in my free time.
ashvik-talluru.quote: I remember that I was never able to get along at school. I was at the foot of the class.

leyang-zeng.quote: I am not bound to win, but I am bound to be true. I am not bound to succeed, but I am bound to live up to what light I have.

skills.title: U of A Star Lab AI Assistant

saahas-nalabhotu.quote: Mamba mentality is all about focusing on the process and trusting in the hard work when it matters most.

kireeti-gottipati.name: Kireeti Gottipati

kireeti-gottipati.about: My name is Kireeti Gottipati, and I am a sophomore at Mountain Ridge High School in Peoria, Arizona. Through AI in STEM, I hope to bridge the gap between theoretical AI concepts and their practical implementations in our daily lives. A fun fact about me is that I have a 3rd degree black belt in kung fu!
kireeti-gottipati.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.

By combining my passion for technology with an interest in neuroscience, I aim to explore innovative solutions that bridge the gap between data science and medicine through AI in STEM.
ram-suhrut-seelamankalugari.quote: Continuous effort‚Äînot strength or intelligence‚Äîis the key to unlocking our potential.
